title: Marketing for 2Baba 40-Year Concert
description: As an exotic dancer working in a strip club, Anora is encouraged to create an alter-ego, a construct that can appeal to the gendered expectations of the patrons who visit the strip club where she works. She creates Ani, a soft-spoken, coquettish femme who uses a practiced facade of submissiveness to coax dollars out of her patrons.

milestones.title: Initial Research
milestones.description: Four horsemen.The club has clearly delineated rules by which the performers and patrons must abide, for good reason as Anora comes to find out.
